title: Xyanyde
content:
ster certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Cast deep in the Underdark by duergar slaves, the head of this mace is engraved with spiderwebs and ice-cold to the touch.

Xyanyde Location & Where to Find

Location: Shattered Sanctum Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by: Minthara

Xyanyde Notes & Tips

With "small" sample size of 200 hits, there were 79 Faerie Fire procs (39.5%) indicating the proc chance is ~40% Rarity: Rare Value: 330 Gp
